entity.name: Alex Lau (AvengerMoJo)
entity.description: Independent open-source developer building local-first AI tools. Solo-maintaining MoJoAssistant - an on-device cognitive firewall protecting user privacy, agency, and decision-making from public AI risks.

projects.name: MoJoAssistant
projects.description: Local-first AI system protecting user agency, privacy, and data from public AI. Runs entirely on-device with local memory (MCP), multi-model embeddings, adversarial verification, and pedagogical explainability. Fosters digital self-reliance while enabling safe access to powerful models.
